bioconda.name: bioconductor-ruvnormalize
bioconda.summary: RUV for normalization of expression array data

biotools.summary: Removes unwanted variation from gene expression data when the factor of interest is not defined, e.g., to clean up a dataset for general use or to do any kind of unsupervised analysis.

bioschemas.name: RUVnormalize
bioschemas.summary: Removes unwanted variation from gene expression data when the factor of interest is not defined, e.g., to clean up a dataset for general use or to do any kind of unsupervised analysis.
